name: burn
description: Inflicts a fraction of the Pokemon's max HP every turn and halves the Pokemon's attack stat. Fire-type Pokemon cannot be burned by Fire-type moves. The damage is skipped if the opponent faints during that turn.

name: freeze
description: The Pokemon is unable to use moves. They cannot be thawed out unless hit by a Fire-type move that can inflict burn, or if the opponent uses haze.
